snippet: Antigovernment protesters in Kiev captured and beat a plainclothes policeman in the part of the city controlled by demonstrators, the authorities said Saturday.
abstract: Ukrainian Interior Ministry says plainclothes policeman was detained and beaten by antigovernment protesters in Kiev; opposition leaders deny entire account.
lead_paragraph: Antigovernment protesters in Kiev captured and beat a plainclothes policeman in the part of the city controlled by demonstrators, the authorities said Saturday.

headline.main: Protesters Beat Police Officer in Ukraine, Ministry Says
headline.print_headline: Protesters Beat Police Officer in Ukraine, Ministry Says
